section.name: Resource Types
section.p: A resource can be associated with multiple types. The combination of a resource group, name, type and version is used to construct an artifact uri.

One or more type declarations may be added within an enclosing <types> element. The nested <type> element declares the type name under the id attribute. Optional properties may be declared as nested <property> elements.

The jar type is given special consideration when constructing classpath information. If a resource is declared as a dependeny of a project and that resource declares that it is a jar type, then the resource will be included in classpath constuction.
